name: Plumpy
overview: Game was updated to version 1.1 by its original author in 2020. Collect keys to open an exit. Avoid baddies and spike traps. Collect hearts to refill your energy. Collect diamonds and other objects to add bonus points to your score. Written in 100% 68K assembly language. Game idea & original version by Paul Tankard. Amiga conversion & graphics by Jason Lucas. Sound by Paul Tankard and Jason Lucas.
